sentences.en: At this meeting Olga's bookish and countrified sister, Tatiana ( Tanya ) , falls in love with Onegin.
sentences.cn: 聚会中,奥佳那位书生气十足且满身土气的姐姐塔替雅娜爱上了奥涅金.

sentences.en: Besides, many of them always retained their countrified simplicity.
sentences.cn: 而且也仍然不缺少在任何情形下还依旧好好的保留着那乡村纯朴气质的妇人.

sentences.en: the countrified existence of the newly rich
sentences.cn: 新贵们老土的生活方式

sentences.en: The sound veers between jazz and countrified blues.
sentences.cn: 音乐在爵士乐和乡村布鲁斯乐之间来回转换。

words.tran_cn: 粗俗的；头脑简单的；乡村的；带乡村风味的；质朴的

trans.tran_cn: 乡下派头的，粗俗的，土气，土里土气，土头土脑
trans.tran_en: typical of the countryside, or made to seem typical of the countryside
